name: Tic Tac Toe game for your website
name_original: Tic Tac Toe game for your website
description:
The game has three game modes

1. Easy mode with AI

2. Hard mode with AI

3. Local multiplayer

The same download file is used for this listing's demo.  You may try the game before you download it.

Simply upload the file to your website or add the game to any of your mobile or web applications by uploading the file to your server.

For any customization, please comment or write to contact@shepherd.games
